parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region that you want to query.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to **INSTANCE**.
